title: The Control Panel may soon disappear in future Windows 10 builds
text:
The Control Panel may soon disappear in future Windows 10 builds 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
In a twitter exchange with a Windows Insider, Microsoft's Gabe Aul and Brandon LeBlanc acknowledged the unnecessary complexity due to two se...
